item.title: Highscore?
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”] mysql_connect('localhost', 'root', 'root'); mysql_select_db('highscores'); You need to configure that first line to your username / password. If they are both ‘root’ I recommend changing for security reasons.

If they are hooked up, you need to create the connection in the server, to add the query to the database (the highscores wont show anything unless the table has at least one row.)[/quote]

Wouldn’t he want it to connect to the server/websites ip I believe that might be the reason its not showing up on the website, but I could be wrong about that too

Read full topic

item.title: Highscore?

item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I’m lost ? its save the infomation into the database but it don’t show up on the website and i have no errros . ? it saved the highscore then i logout. HELP!

[code]<?php
// MYSQL
mysql_connect(‘localhost’, ‘root’, ‘root’);
mysql_select_db(‘highscores’);

$sig_support = false;

$admins = array(“livo”);
